divs: Sighting DetailsWife and I were sitting on front porch Saw two difused lights moving slowly very apart then realised they were from one object Thought lights were from helicopters Then it made a sharp turn Suddenly about 200 ft of the craft lit up with disco type lights Lights were red orange blue green to yellow white Looked like electronic exhaust It then accelerated to about 100 mph Same altitude about 600 ft off the ground Disappeared over the lights of Hesperia heading towards inter state 15 Jim McGuire
Summary: Dark colored craft About 400 ft long Speed about 20 mph
